# Aerial Summoning Dance (Spell)

[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])
**Level:** [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]]
**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]]
**Casting Time:** 3 rounds
**Components:** V, S, DF
**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
**Effect:** One summoned Large air elemental
**Duration:** 1 round/level
**Saving Throw:** None
**Spell Resistance:** No
**Source:** Races of Faerun (WotC), pg 189

As *[[Summon Monster VI (Spell)|summon monster VI]]*, except as noted above and that casting the spell requires a flying dance by the caster and at least four aarakocra, all of whom are treated as participating in the spellcasting for the purpose of provoking attacks of opportunity and maintaining concentration.
